message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,500 for it, which is a fair price considering its worth to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's worth to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $9,500 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway.  How about we settle on $10,500? This still allows you a good deal while ensuring I get a fair price for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $10,000. How about we try $10,000? I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.
